name: Garbage Day (itch) (talbeats)
description:
CONTROLS

Arrow Keys- Move left and right

Spacebar- Drift

RULES

Drift INTO trash cans to knock them out of the way!

Avoid the potholes!

Drive into window cleaner to get some health back!

After 3 hits, the game will stop. 

Refresh the page to play again!

NOTES

I had a lot of fun developing this. I wanted to make something where there was a satisfying timing mechanic and I had a lot of fun taking that idea and running with it. I'm classifying this as a prototype because there's a lot of basic features missing and I think I probably could make a full game out of it but I just didn't wanna stick with this project for too long.
